name: Secrets of Magic 5: Back to School
name_original: Secrets of Magic 5: Back to School
description:
Victoria and Beatrix are back at the School of Magic just in time to celebrate the best time of the year, Halloween! And these two amazing witches need your help to decorate the schoolhouse for this exciting celebration. Get ready and join the adventure in this brand new match 3 game!

Features

  • Help Victoria find Hidden ingredients in 3D scenes
  • Master the gameplay by beating the top scores
  • Earn golden coins and buy spooky decorations
  • Solve amazing Jigsaw Puzzles
  • Welcome to a fun Halloween party
